name: Lost Marble
description:
This is my first open source and free game that I'm publishing. This game was made by Unreal Engine 4.26. I'm making game files open source to let other developers see how I made this game. You can find the source code via the github page. Feel free to add your thoughts in the comment section.

Story:

Find all scattered crystals to be able to escape the mystery world. There are 8 special crystals that is required to open the portal and escape. Beside finding all the required crystals the are cannons in the way that you need to dodge and find a way out.

PC Controls:
  • Use WASD for Moving
